example.eg: Some furniture designers are only interested in style, while others believe the utility of the piece is most important.
example.egtrans: 有些家具设计师只对家具的款式感兴趣，而另一些则认为功用最为重要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 效用, 功用, 实用性

dsense.name: utility
dsense.guideword: often plural (electricity, gas, water, etc.) (水、电等)

example.eg: The price of utilities has risen steeply in recent years.
example.egtrans: 近年来水电气等的价格暴涨。

example.eg: Utility refers to the amount of satisfaction a consumer gets from goods or services.

dsense.name: utilities
dsense.guideword: mainly US (shares in electricity, gas, water, etc.)

example.eg: Utilities can be a reliable investment when markets are unstable.

dsense.name: public utility
dsense.guideword: usually plural (stock, bond of such a company)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 公共事业股票债券，公用事业股票债券

dsense.name: sport utility vehicle, sports utility vehicle

trans_examp.trans_cn: 运动型多用途车, 运动型休旅车
水电费账单，公共事业费账单

example.eg: The utility pole fell over in the storm, cutting off the power.
